on_entry: @s gabrielaplok:remove_reloading
/function guns/fire/awp
/event entity @s[scores={awp=1..}] gabrielaplok:add_pull_back
v.gun_delay = q.life_time;
/playanimation @s animation.awp.pullback fire 0 "!q.is_item_name_any('slot.weapon.mainhand', 0, 'gabrielaplok:awp')"
@s gabrielaplok:remove_pull_back
v.gun_delay = q.life_time;
/execute as @s[hasitem={item=gabrielaplok:awp_mag, data=9}, tag=!reloading] run event entity @s gabrielaplok:add_reloading
/execute as @s[hasitem={item=gabrielaplok:awp_mag, data=8}, tag=!reloading] run event entity @s gabrielaplok:add_reloading
/execute as @s[hasitem={item=gabrielaplok:awp_mag, data=7}, tag=!reloading] run event entity @s gabrielaplok:add_reloading
/execute as @s[hasitem={item=gabrielaplok:awp_mag, data=6}, tag=!reloading] run event entity @s gabrielaplok:add_reloading
/execute as @s[hasitem={item=gabrielaplok:awp_mag, data=5}, tag=!reloading] run event entity @s gabrielaplok:add_reloading
/execute as @s[hasitem={item=gabrielaplok:awp_mag, data=4}, tag=!reloading] run event entity @s gabrielaplok:add_reloading
/execute as @s[hasitem={item=gabrielaplok:awp_mag, data=3}, tag=!reloading] run event entity @s gabrielaplok:add_reloading
/execute as @s[hasitem={item=gabrielaplok:awp_mag, data=2}, tag=!reloading] run event entity @s gabrielaplok:add_reloading
/execute as @s[hasitem={item=gabrielaplok:awp_mag, data=1}, tag=!reloading] run event entity @s gabrielaplok:add_reloading
/execute as @s[hasitem={item=gabrielaplok:awp_mag, data=0}, tag=!reloading] run event entity @s gabrielaplok:add_reloading
/function effect/gun_dryfire
v.gun_delay = q.life_time;
/execute as @s[hasitem={item=gabrielaplok:awp, location=slot.weapon.mainhand}] run function guns/reload/awp
